thermometer:
<launch> 
    <node name="thermometer" pkg="thermometer" type="thermometer" output="screen" />

    <!-- Defines the percentages to consider low, moderate or high risk -->
    <param name="lowrisk" value="0,20" />
    <param name="midrisk" value="21,65" />
    <param name="highrisk" value="66,100" />

    <!-- markov chain -->
    <param name="state0" value="11,16,57,16,0" />
    <param name="state1" value="0,69,31,0,0" />
    <param name="state2" value="0,3,93,4,0" />
    <param name="state3" value="0,1,19,80,0" />
    <param name="state4" value="0,0,0,0,0" />

    <!-- risk values -->
    <param name="HighRisk0" value="0,31.99" />
    <param name="MidRisk0" value="32,35.99" />
    <param name="LowRisk" value="36,37.99" />
    <param name="MidRisk1" value="38,40.99" />
    <param name="HighRisk1" value="41,100" />

    <!-- accuracy in percentage -->
    <param name="data_accuracy" value="90" type="double" />
    <param name="comm_accuracy" value="100" type="double" />

    <!-- persistence -->
    <param name="persist" value="true" type="bool" />
    <param name="path" value="thermometer_output.csv" type="str" />

</launch>
oximeter:
<launch> 
    <node name="oximeter" pkg="oximeter" type="oximeter" output="screen" />

    <!-- Defines the percentages to consider low, moderate or high risk -->
    <param name="lowrisk" value="0,20" />
    <param name="midrisk" value="21,65" />
    <param name="highrisk" value="66,100" />

    <!-- markov chain -->
    <param name="state0" value="0,0,100" />
    <param name="state1" value="0,0,100" />
    <param name="state2" value="0,0,100" />

    <!-- risk values -->
    <param name="LowRisk" value="0,54.99" />
    <param name="MidRisk1" value="55,64.99" />
    <param name="HighRisk1" value="65,100" />

    <!-- accuracy in percentage -->
    <param name="data_accuracy" value="90" type="double" />
    <param name="comm_accuracy" value="100" type="double" />

    <!-- persistence -->
    <param name="persist" value="true" type="bool" />
    <param name="path" value="oximeter_output.csv" type="str" />

</launch>
ecg:
<launch> 
    <node name="ecg" pkg="ecg" type="ecg" output="screen" />

    <!-- Defines the percentages to consider low, moderate or high risk -->
    <param name="lowrisk" value="0,20" />
    <param name="midrisk" value="21,65" />
    <param name="highrisk" value="66,100" />

    <!-- markov chain -->
    <param name="state0" value="78,19,2,1,0" />
    <param name="state1" value="8,78,13,1,0" />
    <param name="state2" value="1,15,71,12,1" />
    <param name="state3" value="1,2,16,74,7" />
    <param name="state4" value="1,1,2,22,73" />

    <!-- risk values -->
    <param name="HighRisk0" value="0,69.99" />
    <param name="MidRisk0" value="70,84.99" />
    <param name="LowRisk" value="85,96.99" />
    <param name="MidRisk1" value="97,114.99" />
    <param name="HighRisk1" value="115,300" />

    <!-- accuracy in percentage -->
    <param name="data_accuracy" value="90" type="double" />
    <param name="comm_accuracy" value="100" type="double" />

    <!-- persistence -->
    <param name="persist" value="true" type="bool" />
    <param name="path" value="ecg_output.csv" type="str" />

</launch>
bloodpressure:
<launch> 
    <node name="bloodpressure" pkg="bloodpressure" type="bloodpressure" output="screen" />

    <!-- Defines the percentages to consider low, moderate or high risk -->
    <param name="lowrisk" value="0,20" />
    <param name="midrisk" value="21,65" />
    <param name="highrisk" value="66,100" />

    <!-- markov chain for diastolic -->
    <param name="diasstate0" value="96,3,1" />
    <param name="diasstate1" value="67,25,8" />
    <param name="diasstate2" value="53,23,24" />
    <!-- risk values for diastolic -->
    <param name="diasLowRisk" value="0,79.99" />
    <param name="diasMidRisk" value="80,89.99" />
    <param name="diasHighRisk" value="90,300" />

    <!-- accuracy in percentage for diastolic -->
    <param name="diasdata_accuracy" value="90" type="double" />
    <param name="diascomm_accuracy" value="100" type="double" />

    <!-- markov chain for systolic -->
    <param name="syststate0" value="85,13,2" />
    <param name="syststate1" value="34,51,15" />
    <param name="syststate2" value="10,28,62" />
    <!-- risk values for systolic -->
    <param name="systLowRisk" value="0,119.99" />
    <param name="systMidRisk" value="120,139.99" />
    <param name="systHighRisk" value="140,300" />

    <!-- accuracy in percentage for systolic -->
    <param name="systdata_accuracy" value="90" type="double" />
    <param name="systcomm_accuracy" value="100" type="double" />

    <!-- persistence -->
    <param name="persist" value="true" type="bool" />
    <param name="path" value="bloodpressure_output.csv" type="str" />

</launch>
